Skeleton Writer 0 Open(skeleton_stream).
Skeleton Writer 0   BeginStep() new step 0
Skeleton Writer 0   CurrentStep() returns 0
Skeleton Writer 0     PutSync(mySyncString)
Skeleton Writer 0   CurrentStep() returns 0
Skeleton Writer 0     PutDeferred(myArray)
Skeleton Writer 0     PerformPuts()
Skeleton Writer 0   EndStep()
Skeleton Writer 0   BeginStep() new step 1
Skeleton Writer 0   CurrentStep() returns 1
Skeleton Writer 0     PutSync(mySyncString)
Skeleton Writer 0   CurrentStep() returns 1
Skeleton Writer 0     PutDeferred(myArray)
Skeleton Writer 0     PerformPuts()
Skeleton Writer 0   EndStep()
Skeleton Writer 0 Close(skeleton_stream)
